comments.author: Nexus.8153
comments.body:
Since there’s no official Guild Wars 2 “Companion” mobile app for checking traits, skills and sets, the community ended up making some, but since there’s no way to obtain the data other than manually, all the apps are now terribly outdated.

I really wish we could have an API to retrieve traits and skills of each profession (including values, description, icons and so forth) so we could build an Rich, always updated, companion app for the game.

I bet i am not the only one that would like to try some builds / theorycraft while commuting from home to work
